string.text: Fatal Error
PDA Frying
Device Frying
Other Settings
Frequency of checking PDA for "frying" (sec.)
The time interval during a surge or psi storm after what game will try to break your PDA or Devices.
Chance for Devices to fry (%)
Chance for Devices to fry from electric damage (%)
Factor for Devices to fry from radiation (%)
Chance that Devices will break during an emission or psi storm.
Chance that Devices will break from damage from Electras and Pulse anomalies.
For example, if Accumulated Radiation is 10, and Factor for Devices is 0.10, then chance for Devices to break will equal 1%.
Chance of PDA 0.1 to fry (%)
Chance of PDA 1.0 to fry (%)
Chance of PDA 2.0 to fry (%)
Chance of PDA 3.1 to fry (%)
Chance of Military PDA to fry (%)
Chance of PDA 0.1 to BSOD (%)
Chance of PDA 1.0 to BSOD (%)
Chance of PDA 2.0 to BSOD (%)
Chance of PDA 3.1 to BSOD (%)
Chance of Military PDA to BSOD (%)
Chance that PDA 0.1 will temporary break after an emission or psi storm.
Chance that PDA 1.0 will temporary break after an emission or psi storm.
Chance that PDA 2.0 will temporary break after an emission or psi storm.
Chance that PDA 3.1 will temporary break after an emission or psi storm.
Chance that Military PDA will temporary break after an emission or psi storm.
Chance of PDA 0.1 to fry from electric damage (%)
Chance of PDA 1.0 to fry from electric damage (%)
Chance of PDA 2.0 to fry from electric damage (%)
Chance of PDA 3.1 to fry from electric damage (%)
Chance of Military PDA to fry from electric damage (%)
Chance that the PDA 0.1 will break from damage from Electras and Pulse anomalies.
Chance that the PDA 1.0 will break from damage from Electras and Pulse anomalies.
Chance that the PDA 2.0 will break from damage from Electras and Pulse anomalies.
Chance that the PDA 3.1 will break from damage from Electras and Pulse anomalies.
Chance that the Military PDA will break from damage from Electras and Pulse anomalies.
Chance that the PDA 0.1 will break during an emission or psi storm.
Chance that the PDA 1.0 will break during an emission or psi storm.
Chance that the PDA 2.0 will break during an emission or psi storm.
Chance that the PDA 3.1 will break during an emission or psi storm.
Chance that the Military PDA will break during an emission or psi storm.
Factor for PDA 0.1 to fry from radiation (%)
Factor for PDA 1.0 to fry from radiation (%)
Factor for PDA 2.0 to fry from radiation (%)
Factor for PDA 3.1 to fry from radiation (%)
Factor for Military PDA to fry from radiation (%)
For example, if Accumulated Radiation is 10, and Factor for PDA is 1, then chance for PDA 0.1 to break will equal 10%.
For example, if Accumulated Radiation is 10, and Factor for PDA is 0.75, then chance for PDA 1.0 to break will equal 7%.
For example, if Accumulated Radiation is 10, and Factor for PDA is 0.50, then chance for PDA 2.0 to break will equal 5%.
For example, if Accumulated Radiation is 10, and Factor for PDA is 0.25, then chance for PDA 3.1 to break will equal 2%.
For example, if Accumulated Radiation is 10, and Factor for PDA is 0.10, then chance for Military PDA to break will equal 1%.
Minimal Amount of Accumulated Radiation
If Accumulated Radiation is more than Minimal Amount of Accumulated Radiation, then game will try to break your PDA or Devices.
Frequency of checking for breaking from radiation (sec.)
If Accumulated Radiation is more than Minimal Amount of Accumulated Radiation, then game will try to break your PDA or Devices every this amount of seconds.
Glitch scale for PDA from radiation.
For example, 1 - a lot of glitch from minor dose of radiation, 0 - no glitch even at the centre of Reactor No. 4.
Accumulated Radiation scale
Scales how much Accumulated Radiation you get.
Accumulated Radiation lower amount
The amount of Accumulated Radiation you lose over time.
Minimal time for reboot (sec.)
The minimal time for reboot after emission or psi storm. Must be lower than Maximum time for reboot.
Maximum time for reboot (sec.)
The maximum time for reboot after emission or psi storm. Must be higher than Minimal time for reboot.
Chance for PDA to get damaged (%)
The chance for PDA to get damaged after receiving physical damage.
PDA "Beep" radius
If there are stalkers within this radius, the PDA will emit an audible signal. Works only on later PDA models.
Key to reboot PDA
Select key for rebooting PDA.
Passive glitch for PDA
Passive glitch for a PDA that will always be present.
